newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico same-day peso ends firmer on swaps.
newsitem.headline: Mexico same-day peso ends firmer on swaps.

text.p: Mexico's same-day peso closed five centavos firmer at 7.7420/7.7500 on Thursday due to pre-weekend swaps and dollars flowing back into a calmer market, traders said.
"It's a lot calmer today...it seems that the hurricane has finally died down," said a trader. "Dealers felt like selling (dollars) when they saw the market was calmer."
The benchmark 48-hour peso and the 24-hour contract reversed their early weakness to meanwhile stand 1.5 and 2.9 centavos firmer, respectively, at 7.7625/7.7700 and 7.7475/7.7550 per dollar.
